data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the northeast monsoon associated with a cold front, winds will strengthen gradually over the coastal areas of Guangdong today. Temperatures will fall appreciably at night. It will be windy in the next couple of days. The weather will be cold in the morning and at night over the inland areas. Under the persistent influence of the monsoon, it will remain cool in the morning over the coast of southern China midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260207","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches and relatively low visibility in the morning. Bright periods in the afternoon.
